text: This user encountered an error when trying to connect to a PostgreSQL database using psql. The error message indicates that the connection attempt was refused, suggesting that the server is not running or accepting TCP/IP connections on port 5433 at "127.0.0.1". This is likely due to firewall or security settings blocking the connection.
